g.text: Each player sends their selected clan to each other.
Each player sends their unit type upgrades one by
one to each player after clicking Done in the
Purchase Menu. In the following scenario only the
Each player sends their selected landing zone
If proximity zones overlap affected players need to
select a new landing zone or confirm to keep the
Client 2 informs the others that its landing zone is valid.
The others have overlapping proximity zones though.
Client 1 informs the others that it stays at the original zone.
The host selects a new landing zone and it does not
overlap with the others so the game can finally start.
